content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Describe one argument made in the passage. Describe one relevant context in which the sermon was delivered. Explain one way in which views such as those expressed in the passage were challenged later in the 1600s.

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
